Job Title: Director, Salesforce Marketing Cloud Implementation 

Location: Denver, CO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Consulting, Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
As our Director, Salesforce Marketing Cloud Implementation, you will…Inspire a talented team of digital project managers, driving day-to-day workflow and fostering growth and development. You'll spearhead digital resource planning, ensuring we have the skills and resources needed to stay ahead. Collaborating closely with Account Management and New Business teams, you'll shape the digital strategy for our clients and work with our SVP, Program Management on project scopes and plans. If you're ready to make a real impact in digital project management, we want you on our team!Be Accountable and ResponsibleOverall responsibility for the flow and efficiency of work across the digital team, from SOW development, planning, creative, development, testing, launch, reporting and maintenanceReporting to Sr Management on overall resource planning/utilizationWeekly, quarterly, and yearly reporting on various aspects of digital projects, including profitability, forecasting, types of projects, who is working on what, etc.Build and sustain relationships at all levels and with all groups in the agency in order to assist with adjusting deliverables as needed with clients. Alert the team if a project strays out of scope or the originally set parameterLead contingency planning, and problem resolution, and recommend solutions to maintain schedules, budgets, and quality deliverablesManage freelance hours and cost for content development and external production as neededDevelop, manage, and enforce a rigorous approvals process internally through the production phases
